name: limit
label: Limit
help: Number of connections to return. Defaults to 10, with a maximum value of 500

name: firstName
label: First Name
help: First name of person to filter by

name: lastName
label: Last Name
help: Last name of person to filter by

name: position
label: Position
help: Job position of person to filter by

name: locations
label: Locations
help: Locations to filter by (e.g., New York, San Francisco)

name: industries
label: Industries
help: Industries to filter by (e.g., Software Development, Technology)

name: currentCompanies
label: Current Companies
help: Current companies to filter by (e.g., Google, Microsoft)

name: previousCompanies
label: Previous Companies
help: Previous companies to filter by (e.g., Apple, Facebook)

name: schools
label: Schools
help: Schools to filter by (e.g., Stanford University, MIT)
